TopicTitle: Space stations crawling on the ground

Articles.Content:
![PMKRv7s.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/PMKRv7s.jpg)

Seriously?! I'm in a 100x100 km orbit!
This is a known glitch with the fairings getting stuck to your vessel.
Ah so that's the reson. Thanks telling me! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

yeah as SubzeroSpartan7 says, it's a known issue. [Claw's stock bug fix modules](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/97285-KSP-v1-0-2-Stock-Bug-Fix-Modules-%28Release-v1-0-2e-3-10-Jun-15%29) should help and there's a thread with other reports of this problem [here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/118019-Stuck-fairings-break-orbit-in-map-mode-and-prevent-timewarp)

I occasionally get this without stuck fairings or a claw as well. In those cases, switching off SAS usually works. SAS doesn't work while warping anyway, so might as well switch it off, and after warping back on.
